Title: Add new staff
Description: Manager should be able to insert new staff information

Title: View staff information
Description: Manager is able to view staff information

Title: Update staff information
Description: As a manager, he should able to update the information about the staff when needed

Title: View Product Record
Description: As a staff, I should be able to view the product details.

Title: Update Order Record
Description: Update the information of an order which is already placed

Title: Delete Order Record
Description: As a customer, I should able to remove unwanted order.

Title: View Order Record
Description: As a customer, I should able to view what I have just ordered.

Title: Add Order Record
Description: As a customer, I should able to order foods and drinks.

Title: Delete Product Record
Description: As a staff, I should be able to delete unwanted product.

Title: Update Product Record
Description: As a staff, I should be able to update product record such as quantity, status, and etc.

Title: Add Product Record
Description: As a staff, I should be able to add product such as foods and drinks.

Title: View Payment Record
Description: The system should allow staff to view the payment record.

Title: Update Payment Record
Description: The system should allow staff to update the payment record such as payment status (paid or not paid) and etc.

Title: Add Payment Record
Description: The system should be able to add payment.

Title: Pay through credit card
Description: As a casher, I should be able to receive credit card payment

Title: Payment through cash
Description: As a casher, I should able to receive cash when the customer pay their bill

Title: Register as a new member
Description: Staff can help a new customer to  register as a member

Title: View member information
Description: the waiters or manager able to view member information when needed

Title: Edit member information
Description: the system is able to update member information time to time

Title: Pay through paywave
Description: As a customer, I should be able to pay through the paywave

Title: Calculate priority of the order
Description: The system should able to calculate the priority of the order to help better management of food preparing

Title: Send email to supplier for ordering automatically
Description: The system should send email to the supplier automatically if the product in the inventory reached critical level

Title: Check inventory quantity
Description: The system should check the quantity of the inventory, when the product is less than a certain level, the system will show a reminder to add stock

Title: Member reward points
Description: the system should automatically calculate member points for every member when they having meal in the restaurant

Title: Send promotion for members through email
Description: Manager is able to send promotions to all targeted customers
